data.name: Harvester of Dreams : Episode 1 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Harvester of Dreams takes you on board a luxurious airship high above the ground. You’ll find yourself caught between two worlds, a dream and reality. On your journey through the game you will find out, which is which.

HoD is a first-person adventure game (aka walking simulator) taking you into a steampunk inspired scenery. To progress in the game, you will have to find the items required to fix or crack open the locked doors, that you are going to face. Each door reveals a new, unique and interesting room to explore.
Once you have left the ship, the world you find yourself in, becomes even more confusing and disturbing. The unpleasant truth is awaiting you at the very end of your path back into reality.

What to expect in the demo version:

  • Explore the first level of the airship.
  • Steampunk-inspired graphics.
  • Some puzzles from the beginning of the game.
  • English and German voice acting.
  • Full gamepad support inside the game (except for the launcher).

Started out as a personal project a decade ago, HoD 1 is finally about to be finished! All assets have been originally created for this game.
Targeting not only PCs but mobile platforms alike, highly optimized graphics and shaders allowed me to bring the same visual experience to players on most devices.
data.about_the_game:
Harvester of Dreams takes you on board a luxurious airship high above the ground. You’ll find yourself caught between two worlds, a dream and reality. On your journey through the game you will find out, which is which.

HoD is a first-person adventure game (aka walking simulator) taking you into a steampunk inspired scenery. Once you have left the ship, the world you find yourself in, becomes even more confusing and disturbing. The unpleasant truth is awaiting you at the very end of your path back into reality.

What to expect in the demo version:

  • Explore the first level of the airship.
  • Steampunk-inspired graphics.

data.short_description: Harvester of Dreams is a first person adventure game, taking you on board an steampunk airship. Unravel the secret of the ship while you are exploring it room after room.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz, SSE
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ShaderModel 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz, SSE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ShaderModel 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz, SSE
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ShaderModel 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
